summary: JUST BOUGHT VEHICLE AND DRIVING ON THE HIGHWAY WITH SMALL CHILDREN WHEN THE CAR SURGED AND ABRUPTLY STALLED MOMENTARILY ON A 60 MPH HWY. WOULD ONLY DRIVE IN 1AT AND 2ND GEAR AND HAD NO WAY TO EXIT OFF HIGHWAY. ALMOST CAUSED A CAR PILE UP AS THE VEHICLE BEHIND ME HAD TO STOMP ON BRAKES ABRUPTLY. MECHANICS ARE SAYING TRANSMISSION. I HAVEN'T EVEN HAD THIS FOR A WEEK. IT WAS EXTREMELY UNSAFE AND I WAS TERRIFIED AS I HAD 5 LITTLE LIVES IN THE VEHICLE AT THAT TIME.
